content: Hello! Thank you for contacting XYZ Home Services. My name is Avaâ€”how can I help you today? Are you looking to schedule electrical, plumbing, or HVAC work?
Hi, it's for some electrical issues in my house. But honestly, I am super busy this month and probably can't schedule anything until July.
Thanks for letting me know! Would you like me to follow up with you in July, or would you prefer to reach out when your schedule allows?
I'll reach out when I have more time, thanks.
reason: Customer too busy to schedule at this time
